name: 段裘慶
objective: (1) 物聯網概述，(2) 物聯網感知層，(3) 物聯網網路層，(4) 物聯網應用層，(5) 物聯網平台與雲端運算，(6) 無線感測網路 802.15.4 與 ZigBee，(7) 無線感測網路應用，(8) RFID 原理與應用，(9) WSNs 至 IoT，(10) 近期發展與研究議題。
schedule:
(1) Introduction to the Internet of Things (IoT) 
(2) IoT: Perception Layer
(3) IoT: Network Layer
(4) IoT: Application Layer
(5) IoT Platform and Could Computing
* Midterm Exam.
(6) Wireless Sensor Networks (WSNs): 802.15.4 and ZigBee
(7) WSN Applications
(8) Principles and Applications of RFID
(9) WSNs to IoT
(10) Recent Advances and Related Research Issues
* Term Exam.
scorePolicy:
1. Homework: (30%)
2. Examination: (30%) 
  ● Home-Test (Report) Mid-term + Final Exams. (70 min., closed book)
3. Term Project (2-3 members): (30%)
  ● Term report + Oral presentation (Sensor-based APPs)
4. Attendance: (10%)
materials:
1.  Honbo Zhou, "The Internet of Things in the Cloud," CRC Press, 2013.  (文景)
2.  Hakima Chaouch, "The Internet of Things: Connecting Objects to the Web," 
     John Wiely & Sons, 2010.  (亞勃克)
3. 黃志勇等，' 物聯網概論 The IoT," 基峰圖書 AEN002900, 2013.
4. 林顯易等. ' 工業 4.0 理論與實務，" 全華圖書 10456, 2016.
